meanings.definition: biocatalyses: the acceleration of a chemical reaction by a biological catalyst
meanings.sent1: Biocatalyses help speed up reactions in living things.
meanings.sent2: The biocatalyses in our bodies make digestion faster.
meanings.sent3: The biocatalyses in the plant seemed to make it grow super quickly!
meanings.sent4: Her enthusiasm for gardening was like the biocatalyses that made the flowers bloom overnight.
meanings.sent5: The scientist explained how biocatalyses work using a simple experiment.

meanings.definition: biocatalyses: to catalyze a chemical reaction using a biological catalyst
meanings.sent1: We can biocatalyses the reaction by adding enzymes.
